name: Aim Practice By Oriel
description:
This application is used to practice aiming so you can get more precision when you play shooting video games or aiming is required, with the 3 available modes you will significantly improve your aim, the modes you can choose are easy, medium or hard.
HOW TO PLAY:
you have a few seconds to click any square or a strike will be added, you can't click the background or a strike will be added  changes each mode.
medium: squares get smaller and you have fewer seconds to click a square before a strike is added.
hard: the squares are super small and you have very little time before a strike is added.
